mapper.insert: insert into user_file(user_id, file_id, file_name, file_extension, file_pid, folder_type, delete_flag, recovery_time, create_time, last_update_time) values (#{userId}, #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileExtension}, #{filePid}, #{folderType}, #{deleteFlag}, #{recoveryTime}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime})

insert into file( file_md5, file_sha1, file_sha256, file_category, storage_id, file_size, file_cover, refer_count, status, transcode_status, create_time, last_refer_time ) values ( #{fileMD5}, #{fileSHA1}, #{fileSHA256}, #{fileCategory}, #{storageId}, #{fileSize}, #{fileCover}, #{referCount}, 1, #{transcodeStatus}, #{fileCreateTime}, #{fileCreateTime} )
mapper.update: update file set refer_count = refer_count + 1 ,last_refer_time=#{lastReferTime} where file.file_id = #{fileId}
update file set refer_count = refer_count - 1 where file_id = #{fileId}
